Description: Taxonomic binning of the gold standard pooled assembly
CommandUsed:
diamond makedb --in nr.faa.gz --db nr --taxonmap prot.accession2taxid.gz --taxonnodes nodes.dmp
diamond blastx --query anonymous_gsa_pooled.fasta --db nr --outfmt 102 --out 19122017_mousegut_scaffolds.out --block-size 40 --index-chunks 1 --tmpdir tmp
Creator: Meyer, Fernando

Description: Taxonomic binning of the gold standard pooled assembly
CommandUsed: run_ppsp.py --pipelineDir ppsp_pipepline --inputFastaFile anonymous_gsa_pooled.fasta --databaseFile ncbi_taxonomy --refSeq refseq93 --s16Database SILVA_132 --mgDatabase reference_NCBI201502/mg5
Creator: Meyer, Fernando

Description: Taxonomic binning of the gold standard pooled assembly

Description: Taxonomic binning of the gold standard pooled assembly
CommandUsed:
diamond makedb --in nr.faa.gz --db nr_diamond0.9.24 --taxonmap prot.accession2taxid.gz --taxonnodes nodes.dmp
diamond blastx -d nr_diamond0.9.24 -q anonymous_gsa_pooled.fasta -a result -t tmp --index-chunks 1
megan/tools/daa2rma -i result.daa -o 19122017_mousegut_scaffolds.rma --acc2taxa megan/prot_acc2tax-Nov2018X1.abin
#final bins extracted with MEGAN's graphical interface tool
Creator: Meyer, Fernando
